text: efm-langserver の yaml、どんなのが良いですかね。ご意見募集。

現状
```
languages:
  eruby:
    lint-command: 'erb -x -T - | ruby -c'
    lint-stdin: true
    lint-offset: 1
    format-command: 'htmlbeautifier'

  vim:
    lint-command: 'vint -'
    lint-stdin: true

  markdown:
    lint-command: 'markdownlint -s'
    lint-stdin: true
    lint-formats:
      - '%f: %l: %m'
```
